name: dnscontrol-ts
description: Reproducible DNS record entries for zhr.one properties

scripts.preview: npm run build && cd out && ./../lib/dnscontrol preview
scripts.push: npm run preview && cli-confirm "Are you sure you want to push?" && cd out && ./../lib/dnscontrol push
scripts.push-nc: npm run build && cd out && ./../lib/dnscontrol push

author: Vlad Zaharia
